name: Hike Sticker Chat - Fun & Expressive Messaging
description: Why settle for words when you can use stickers & HikeMoji to express yourself better with your close friends & loved ones for free. Just click a selfie or manually create your HikeMoji to create your own personal avatar & stickers.  Now anything you type turns into your personal HikeMoji Sticker and you can further customize it to express your mood.   Now add your personal HikeMoji Stickers to WhatsApp and continue the conversation.   Here are some awesome features in Hike Sticker Chat:  HikeMoji - Just click a selfie or manually create your own avatar. 100+ stickers available featuring your avatar will be available in Hindi & English along with Gujarati, Marathi, Bengali, Tamil, Kanada, Telugu, Malayalam. You can choose over 1000+ hairstyles, facial features, bindis, local clothing, nose pins & more to make your HikeMoji truly yours.  Now anything you type turns into your personal HikeMoji Sticker and you can further customize it to express your mood.   Now add your personal HikeMoji Stickers to WhatsApp and continue the conversation.   Stickers - Get awesome sticker recommendations as you type. We give you the right sticker at the right time to make chatting more fun & expressive.  Quick Reply - Click on a sticker and get instant recommendations for a reply, you dont even need to type a message.  Chat Themes - With unlimited themes, you can choose a background for every chat & make it even more personal.  Hide Chats - Keep your private conversations safe. You can lock your chats with a password or fingerprint.  Privacy - You get complete control over who can see your last seen, profile picture, moments and stories. You can even turn off last seen for specific people.  Security - We dont want you to worry; so all your chats and calls are protected with 128-bit AES and 2048 RSA encryption.  Share - You can send & receive photos, videos, docs, location, etc.  A lot more - We have so many other features like hike web, group chats, swipe to reply, dark mode etc.  Let us know what we can do to make your Hike Sticker Chat experience better. If you have any feedback, questions, concerns, leave us a review on Google Play Store/ app store or email us at: care@hike.in.
